casebody.data:
R.L.S., Respondent,
v.
Willie C. THOMAS, JR., Appellant. WD 81041 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: May 29, 2018
Rehearing Denied July 3, 2018 Crissy Del Percio and Madison K. Peak, Legal Aid of Western Missouri, Kansas City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent. Linda S. Mock, Kansas City, MO, Attorney for Appellant. Before Division Two: Karen King Mitchell, Presiding Judge, and Alok Ahuja and Edward R. Ardini, Jr., Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

Willie Thomas appeals from a judgment entering a full order of protection against him and in favor of R.S. Finding no reversible error, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
